description: For these pickles, I spiced up classic, sweet bread-and-butter slices with allspice and coriander Generally, the smaller the cucumbers, the more crisp the pickles will be I used very small Kirby cucumbers, and a month later mine still crunch with each bite.
title: Bread-and-Butter Pickles
text:
For these pickles, I spiced up classic, sweet bread-and-butter slices with allspice and coriander. Generally, the smaller the cucumbers, the more crisp the pickles will be. I used very small Kirby cucumbers, and a month later mine still crunch with each bite.
Featured in: Your Burger Will Thank You.
